complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the 'Establish Design System Foundation' task into 5 subtasks covering: 1) Color palette definition with accessibility validation, 2) Typography system implementation, 3) Spacing and layout standards, 4) Icon system creation/selection, and 5) Documentation and developer guidelines.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task requires creating a comprehensive design system from scratch with multiple components (colors, typography, spacing, icons) while ensuring accessibility compliance. It's foundational to the entire project and requires both technical implementation and documentation.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Implement Visual Hierarchy for Organization Chart
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the 'Implement Visual Hierarchy for Organization Chart' task into 4 subtasks covering: 1) Hierarchy level spacing and indentation implementation, 2) Connection line styling (solid vs. dashed), 3) Grid/guide background implementation, and 4) Responsive layout adjustments for different screen sizes.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task involves complex CSS grid implementation, visual hierarchy design principles, and ensuring the chart remains scannable across different organizational structures and screen sizes.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Redesign Agent Cards for Reduced Density
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the 'Redesign Agent Cards for Reduced Density' task into 3 subtasks covering: 1) Card component structure and essential information display, 2) Card styling with proper spacing and readability at different zoom levels, and 3) Integration with the side panel for extended details.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task requires balancing information density with usability, implementing a clean component structure, and ensuring the cards work well within the larger system. The complexity comes from the design decisions and integration requirements.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Implement Dark Theme with Proper Contrast
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the 'Implement Dark Theme with Proper Contrast' task into 3 subtasks covering: 1) Dark theme color palette definition with contrast validation, 2) Component-specific dark theme styling implementation, and 3) Theme switching mechanism with proper state persistence.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: While implementing a dark theme requires attention to detail for contrast ratios and accessibility, the scope is well-defined. The complexity comes from ensuring consistent application across all components and meeting WCAG standards.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Implement Status Indicators with Color and Icons
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the 'Implement Status Indicators with Color and Icons' task into 3 subtasks covering: 1) Status indicator component design with icon and color combinations, 2) Animation implementation for different states, and 3) Accessibility testing and optimization for screen readers and color blindness.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task combines visual design, animation, and accessibility concerns. The complexity comes from ensuring the indicators are both visually appealing and fully accessible, with proper animations that don't cause issues for users with vestibular disorders.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the 'Implement Microinteractions for Agent Cards' task into 3 subtasks covering: 1) Hover state styling and transitions, 2) Quick action buttons implementation with proper visual feedback, and 3) Keyboard accessibility for all hover interactions.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task focuses on enhancing the user experience with subtle interactions. While not extremely complex technically, it requires attention to detail for smooth transitions and ensuring all interactions are accessible via keyboard.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the 'Implement Animated Transitions for Reorganization' task into 4 subtasks covering: 1) Position calculation and tracking system, 2) Animation implementation with proper easing functions, 3) Performance optimization for large organization charts, and 4) Reduced motion support for accessibility.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task involves complex DOM manipulation, position calculations, and performance considerations. Animating multiple elements simultaneously while maintaining context and ensuring good performance is technically challenging.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Enhance Task Panel with Prioritization and Sorting
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the 'Enhance Task Panel with Prioritization and Sorting' task into 3 subtasks covering: 1) Priority chips/tags implementation with color coding, 2) Sorting controls and functionality, and 3) Collapsible sections for task grouping and organization.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task requires implementing multiple interactive features (sorting, collapsing) while maintaining a consistent design. The complexity comes from the state management needed for sorting and expanded sections.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Implement Department Overlay with Consistent Styling
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the 'Implement Department Overlay with Consistent Styling' task into 4 subtasks covering: 1) Overlay component structure and backdrop implementation, 2) Department grid layout with consistent card styling, 3) Open/close transitions and animations, and 4) Focus management and keyboard accessibility.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task involves creating a modal overlay with complex styling requirements, transitions, and accessibility considerations. Managing focus properly and ensuring keyboard accessibility adds to the complexity.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the 'Implement UX Writing Guidelines' task into 3 subtasks covering: 1) Content audit and terminology standardization, 2) Implementation of content dictionary for consistent language, and 3) Review and update of all UI text elements for compliance with guidelines.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task requires a systematic approach to content across the application. While not technically complex, it requires attention to detail and coordination across multiple components to ensure consistency.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Implement Keyboard Navigation and Screen Reader Support
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the 'Implement Keyboard Navigation and Screen Reader Support' task into 5 subtasks covering: 1) Tab order implementation and focus indicators, 2) ARIA attributes addition to all components, 3) Keyboard shortcuts for common actions, 4) Focus trap implementation for modals and overlays, and 5) Screen reader testing and optimization.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task involves comprehensive accessibility implementation across the entire application. It requires deep knowledge of ARIA, keyboard navigation patterns, and screen reader behavior, plus extensive testing with assistive technologies.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Implement Zoom and Pan Navigation with Orientation Cues
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the 'Implement Zoom and Pan Navigation with Orientation Cues' task into 5 subtasks covering: 1) Background grid implementation with proper scaling, 2) Zoom functionality with mouse and button controls, 3) Pan navigation with mouse drag, 4) Mini-map navigator implementation, and 5) Performance optimization for large charts.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task involves complex interactions, coordinate transformations, and performance considerations. Implementing smooth zoom and pan while maintaining context and performance is technically challenging, especially for large organization charts.
